summary: A small mod that replaces the imperial armor with Morrowind imperial armor.
descriptionHtml:
Hey I tried, that's all that matters :p
It may not be all that pretty, but here's my imperial armor replacer. The Imperial light cuirass, Imperial light helmet, Imperial heavy boots, and Steel Nordic gauntlets have all been slightly tweaked and renamed, and given a new texture more akin to the one seen in Morrowind.
I hope you like it, and thanks for your download. :)

(Note: It's males only)
author: Ronin
